mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.contract_id, t.contract_type, t.guarantee, t.guarantee_type, t.date_of_contract, t.dbzzq_starttime, t.dbzzq_entime, t.guarantee_period, t.amount_guaranteed, t.dbqxzzq_money, t.guarantee_way, t.is_lawsuit, t.agent
